price: Vallahi, ülkede bozgunculuk çıkarmak için gelmediğimizi ve hırsız da olmadığımızı biliyorsunuz, dediler.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum mā ji'nā linuf'sida fī al-arḍi wamā kunnā sāriqīna
